owner.username: Galt Museum & Archives on The Commons

title._content: Fire At First Baptist Church - Crowd

description._content: 15 January 1953 7 cm x 10.2 cm black and white photograph A crowd of people watch the fire at First Baptist Church at 402 8 Street South. These photographs were transferred from the City of Lethbridge Records Centre to the Archives. The photographs were collected from inside the Lethbridge Fire Department and from private contributors, to be used in the book, Lethbridge: A Century of Fire Fighting, by Ted Bochan and Alex Johnston (Lethbridge, 1986). No provenance is available for the privately contributed photographs. To obtain high quality and larger reproductions of this image please visit the Galt Museum & Archives website: www.galtmuseum.com/archives.htm and include thIs number in your request: P19981071209
